materials.raw_text:
- Erbium (Er): 10 grams 
 - Germanium (Ge): 1 gram 
 - Lead (Pb): 60 grams 
 - Zinc (Zn): 10 grams

 - Germanium: Available from electronics suppliers or chemical material vendors. 
 - Lead: Procure from metal suppliers or construction material outlets. 
 - Zinc: Available at hardware stores or metal suppliers.
